hint: The color of the floating button which opens the floating dialog page.
name: button_color
label: Floating Button Color

hint: Service Portal Page to embed in the floating dialog
name: embedded_page
label: Embedded Page

hint: Text for populating the button's ARIA label property
name: aria_button_label
label: ARIA Button Label

hint: String of any additional System Parameters (sysparm_#) needed to support the embedded page.  Must start with the ampersand '&'.
name: url_system_parameters
label: Additional URL System Parameters

name: is_sp_page
label: Embedded Page is a Service Portal Page

hint: Text name of Retina Icon listed on HI - https://hi.service-now.com/styles/retina_icons/retina_icons.html
name: retina_icon
label: Button Open - Retina Icon

hint: Provide the FontAwesome icon name  based on the FontAwesome 4.7 list - https://fontawesome.com/v4.7.0/icons/ - e.g. fa-comments-o
name: fa_icon
label: Button Open - Font Awesome Icon
